WRITING.TITLE: It's Right About Time for a Massive Solar Storm To Hit Earth

WRITING.TEXT: I guess it's all a matter of body theory and personal identity theory. I think Hawkings is Hawkings. He has his own mind; he just happens to be placed in a non-functioning body. It ultimately asks the question: Is Hawkings famous for his discoveries or disabilities?
ehh that's arguable. Computers have taken over the extent of which he can communicate in society, but haven't taken him over personally.

WRITING.TITLE: Stephen Hawking: Computers will take over humans in 100 years
[Discussion] What poem takes you to every emotion?
WRITING.TEXT: Just anything that makes you feel.

WRITING.TITLE: Raw, emotional music?
WRITING.TEXT: I'm looking for songs with a lot of emotion? Just raw, honest, weird stuff with deep lyrics and raw emotion. Any suggestions.
